lyrics:
43 contributorsbag lady lyricsverse 1

all you must hold onto
is you is you is you

one day all them bags gon get in your way

chorus

pack light pack light
ooh ooh

verse 2

from you its true oh yes they do

see erykah badu liveget tickets as low as 99you might also likechorus

and we cant let go
oh when someone hurts you oh so bad inside
you cant deny it you cant stop crying
so oh oh oh
if you start breathin you wont believe it
youll feel so much better so much better baby
